name: Grooveyard
description:
FREE for a limited time only!

As midnight black engulfs the land
And spooks start dancing badly
A hundred levels draw you in
And entertain you madly

You turn and run and try to solve
The tantalizing puzzles
While werewolves bark and snarl and howl
With whiskers on their muzzles

'Cos this is GrooveYard! GrooveYard, yeah!
It's iPhone / iPad fun
With gameplay that ain't dumb
Yeah this is GrooveYard! GrooveYard, wow!
It's a universal build
You're gonna play a lot
Sway a lot
Yeah!
